title: Ring of flight
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Jewellery                                                                          |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Ring of flight                                                                     |
| Icon | [![Ring of flight.png](/images/1/1e/Ring_of_flight.png)](/File:Ring_of_flight.png) |

|   |                                       |
| - | ------------------------------------- |
|   | A ring that grants its wearer flight. |

By wearing a [ring of flight](), you gain the ability to [fly](/Fly "Fly") for as long as you wear it. Note that flying characters still trigger [traps](/Trap "Trap") as normal.

## Strategy

Flight is useful in areas where [water](/Water "Water") is common, such as the [Swamp](/Swamp "Swamp") or [Shoals](/Shoals "Shoals"). Having flight on hand can help you avoid or fight monsters wherever water and lava are present. While many monsters in the aforementioned Lair branches swim faster than the average player, flight still prevents many of the penalties while fighting in water, including its effect on [invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility").

A ring of flight can largely replace [potions of flight](/Potions_of_flight "Potions of flight"), though using the ring slot temporarily should be a (minor) consideration.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), flight was a temporary ability. You could [evoke](/Evoke "Evoke") the ring for 3 MP, with a failure rate that scaled down with [Evocations](/Evocation "Evocation"). You could not extend the duration of the effect by evoking the ring while already flying.
- The ring of flight was introduced in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), replacing the [ring of levitation](/Ring_of_levitation "Ring of levitation").

Ring of flight

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Type Jewellery
Name Ring of flight
Icon
A ring that grants its wearer flight.

By wearing a ring of flight, you gain the ability to fly for as long as you wear it. Note that flying characters still trigger traps as normal.

Strategy

Flight is useful in areas where water is common, such as the Swamp or Shoals. Having flight on hand can help you avoid or fight monsters wherever water and lava are present. While many monsters in the aforementioned Lair branches swim faster than the average player, flight still prevents many of the penalties while fighting in water, including its effect on invisibility.

A ring of flight can largely replace potions of flight, though using the ring slot temporarily should be a (minor) consideration.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, flight was a temporary ability. You could evoke the ring for 3 MP, with a failure rate that scaled down with Evocations. You could not extend the duration of the effect by evoking the ring while already flying.
  • The ring of flight was introduced in 0.12, replacing the ring of levitation.
